pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, November 30, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, November 30, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario  

2 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Chairman and CEO of General Electric, John Flannery.

Prime Ministerâ€™s Office, Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Closed to media
